resources.string: Go to the link and choose what you want to learn.
Some popular helpful sites for Computer Greeks. You can ask any question here and the Developers or the knowledgable person will give your answer.
Check out these links for Video tutorials

This app is developed for the beginner pogrammers who want to start their programming career but found many obstacles in their way of learning. This app's purpose is to make their way easier. They can easily find the learning sites and learn effectively. 

The app is developed by Saraban Tasnim Sharin, student of Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Daffodil International University.
